SELECT p.p_id, p.p_name, ( SELECT file_name FROM p_attach WHERE p_id = p.p_id ORDER BY p_id ASC LIMIT 1 ) AS file_name, p.p_price, p.p_cate, c.ctg_small, d.d_info, (SELECT p_id FROM zzim WHERE userid = #{userid} AND p_id = p.p_id) AS p_like FROM product p JOIN ctg c ON p.p_cate = c.ctg_s_no JOIN delivery d ON p.p_delivery = d.d_num WHERE p.p_cate = #{no} GROUP BY p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_cate, c.ctg_small, d.d_info
ORDER BY p_hit DESC
ORDER BY p_date DESC
ORDER BY p_sell DESC
ORDER BY p_price
LIMIT #{pageCnt} OFFSET #{start}
